page.title: 08BIOGRAPHY:REV STONESTREET
page.content: A COMPARATIVE NEWCOMER TO THE AREA IS THE VICAR OF ST.PETERS CHURCH,THE REV MALCOLM STONESTREET.HE IS THE TEAM RECTOR OF 3 CHURCHES IN THE AREA.REV STONESTREET DYNAMIC PERSON WHO WOULD LIKE TO SEE THE RETURN OF SOME COMMUNITY SPIRIT.ONE OF THE WAYS HE HOPES TO DO THIS IS A ROAD STEWARD SCHEME,WHERE 1 PERSON IN A STREET WILL TRY TO HELP THE OLD.BE A GOOD NEIGHBOUR.FOR THE YOUNG AREA HE SET UP A NUMBER OF PORTER CABIN SCHEMES.TO FINANCE THESE IDEAS HE HAS A FUND RAISING SCHEME CALLED THE VICARS PARTNER.REV STONESTREET BIGGEST SCHEME WAS TO CONVERT A MILL INTO A PLACE FOR UNEMPLOYED.WHERE UNEMPLOYED PEOPLE OF THE AREA COULD MEET,DISCUSS PROBLEMS,SPEEK ADVICE AND USE THE FACILITIES IT OFFERS.HOPEFULLY THE REV WILL CREATE A NEW COMMUNITY SPIRIT.
